query.original: What are the best practices for designing a real-time data dashboard for tracking funding opportunities?

findings.content: {"research_id": "test-research-001", "query": "What are the best practices for designing a real-time data dashboard for tracking funding opportunities?", "findings": {"summary": "Real-time data dashboards for funding opportunities require strategic data architecture, user-centric design, and robust technical infrastructure.", "key_insights": [{"insight": "Implement real-time data streaming with Apache Kafka or similar technologies", "confidence": 0.9, "source": "Technical Architecture Best Practices"}, {"insight": "Use responsive design principles for cross-device accessibility", "confidence": 0.85, "source": "UX Design Guidelines"}, {"insight": "Implement role-based access control for data security", "confidence": 0.95, "source": "Security Best Practices"}], "recommendations": ["Use microservices architecture for scalability", "Implement automated data validation pipelines", "Design for mobile-first user experience"]}, "model_used": "sonar-pro", "timestamp": 1758807611.182473}
